name: Modules.Nfc.NfcNDEFTagTechnology
summary: Provides access to NDEF tag and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcNDEFTag

events.name: didConnectTag
events.summary: A event called when NFCNDEFReaderSession try to connect with NDEF tag
events.description: A tag stays connected until your app connects to a different tag or restarts polling. Connecting to a tag that is already connected has no effect.

properties.name: errorDescription
properties.summary: A string containing the localized description of the error.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: didQueryNDEFStatus
events.summary: Asks the reader session for the NDEF support status of the tag.
events.description: Asks the reader session (NFCNDEFReaderSession) for the NDEF support status of the tag.

properties.name: errorDescription
properties.summary: A string containing the localized description of the error.

properties.name: status
properties.summary: Constants that indicate status for an NDEF tag.

properties.name: capacity
properties.summary: Indicates the maximum NDEF message size, in bytes, that you can store on the tag.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: didReadNDEFMessage
events.summary: Retrieves an NDEF message from the tag.
events.description: Retrieves an NDEF message from the tag.

properties.name: errorDescription
properties.summary: A string containing the localized description of the error.

properties.name: message
properties.summary: An NFC NDEF message consisting of an array of payload records.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: didWirteNDEFMessage
events.summary: Saves an NDEF message to a writable tag.
events.description: To determine whether the tag is writable, call queryNDEFStatus and check that the status is NFC_NDEF_READ_WRITE.

properties.name: errorDescription
properties.summary: A string containing the localized description of the error.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: didWriteLock
events.summary: Changes the NDEF tag status to read-only, preventing future write operations.
events.description: Calling this method updates the write access condition byte in the NDEF File Control of the tag's file system, thus locking the tag. This is a permanent action that you cannot undo. After locking the tag, you can no longer write data to it.

properties.name: errorDescription
properties.summary: A string containing the localized description of the error.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: connect
methods.summary: Call to connect NfcNDEFTag from session NFCNDEFReaderSession, connection success or failure result in a didConnectTag event.

methods.name: queryNDEFStatus
methods.summary: Asks the reader session for the NDEF support status of the tag. Success/Failure result in a didQueryNDEFStatus event.

methods.name: readNDEF
methods.summary: Retrieves an NDEF message from the tag. Success/Failure result in a didReadNDEFMessage event.

methods.name: writeLock
methods.summary: Changes the NDEF tag status to read-only, preventing future write operations. Success/Failure result in a didWriteLock event.

methods.name: writeNDEF
methods.summary: Saves an NDEF message to a writable tag. Success/Failure result in a didWirteNDEFMessage event.
